title: Macworld Podcast: The state of the Apple Watch and watchOS
content:
Macworld

The Apple Watch recently had its tenth anniversary, and WWDC is coming up in June. So in this episode of the Macworld Podcast, we’re looking at the state of the Apple Watch–where it’s been, where it’s at now, and what’s in store for the future.

This is episode 932 with Jason Cross, Michael Simon, and Roman Loyola.
